mapper.select:
/*业务员查看询价表*/ select ppi.id,ppi.price_inqury_id,pcu.company_name,pcu.contect_name,su.mobile, ppi.create_time,ppi.status ,su1.username operator from pro_price_inqury ppi left join pro_cus_user pcu on ppi.buyer_company_id = pcu.user_id left join system_users su on ppi.buyer_company_id = su.id left join system_users su1 on ppi.operator = su1.id where (ppi.operator is null or ppi.operator = #{param.loginUserId} or ppi.status in (0,1))
and pcu.company_name like concat('%',#{param.buyerCompanyName},'%')

/*查看询价表及子表*/ select ppi.id,ppi.price_inqury_id,ppi.seller_company_name,ppi.seller_company_address, ppi.seller_contact,ppi.seller_tel, ppi.buyer_ideal_price,pcu.contect_name buyerContactName,pcu.address buyerAddress, pcu.company_name buyerCompanyName,su.mobile buyerMobile, ppi.price,ppi.discount,ppi.total, ppi.price_date,ppi.effective_date,ppi.status,
ppic.product_id,ppic.hs_serial,ppic.desc,ppic.product_size,ppic.product_color, ppic.product_g,ppic.package_way,ppic.box_length,ppic.box_height,ppic.box_wide, ppic.volume,ppic.price,ppic.gross_weight,ppic.net_weight from pro_price_inqury ppi left join pro_cus_user pcu on ppi.buyer_company_id = pcu.user_id left join system_users su on ppi.buyer_company_id = su.id left join pro_price_inqury_child ppic on ppi.price_inqury_id = ppic.price_inqury_id
